attributes.action: Make Ice Hockey as an official sport of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ice Hockey has grown within the UK for many years now, but still isn't being recognised, as it has so little coverage where as football has pages and pages in newpapers all over the country. Nearly every city in the country has a Ice hockey team now and I feel that it is about time that it is seen as another sport that the UK is good at.

rejection.details: Sport is self-governing in the UK. This petition is outside the remit of the Prime Minister.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
